		- easyMineToken.burn(balance) (repairResNew/scscN/Easy_Mine_ICOR2U2.sol#290)

		- easyMineToken.burn(balance) (repairResNew/scscN/Easy_Mine_ICOR2U2.sol#290)

detectors.description:
EasyMineTokenWallet.maxPossibleWithdrawal() (repairResNew/scscN/Easy_Mine_ICOR2U2.sol#116-130) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-daysPassed = (now - (startTime + VESTING_PERIOD)) / 86400 (repairResNew/scscN/Easy_Mine_ICOR2U2.sol#121)
	-res = DAILY_FUNDS_RELEASE * daysPassed - totalWithdrawn (repairResNew/scscN/Easy_Mine_ICOR2U2.sol#122)
